name: Megavaders 5000
description:
"Megavaders 5000" is a very simple indie game, with a very fun gameplay and with a moderate difficulty.
In this game you will have to manage a spaceship to fight against the aliens that you will have in front of you.
The aliens are placed in a certain formation, and in addition, they will be approaching little by little to your ship.
Between your ship and the aliens, there will be destructible platforms that will allow you to cover yourself with the aliens' shots, but you have to be careful, because if the aliens get close to those platforms, they will destroy them.


What to expect:

-Simple and easy to understand gameplay.

-Challenging gameplay

-Retro style

-Historical scoreboard


How to play:

-Left/right arrows to move the ship

-Space to shoot.
